name: Drizzling Rain
description:
On rainy days, monsters appear to eat the people. Your goal is to get home safe, without getting spotted...

Controls:

Left and Right Keys to move.

Space bar to Jump.

Esc (pressed) to quit game.

Programming and art by Willixwolf.

Music and SFX by AARV MUSIC.

This game was made for Vetelino's Summer Jam  - August 2022.
